title: Paul seem capable but he is failing in school

content.prompt: Although Paul seems bright and capable to his parents and friends, he has been failing in school. Paul agrees to speak with a psychologist, who suggests that his problems stem from internal processes such as unrealistic expectations and negative thinking. The psychologistâ€™s view is typical of which of the following models of behavior?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
